General.Name: Estika Tata Tiara Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Estika Tata Tiara Tbk engages in the manufacture and distribution of processed food in Indonesia. The company offers processed beef, chicken, and pao products, as well as bread and marbled beef products under the KIBIF, BOSS, KIPAO, MURATO, Adell, OHAYO, SENTAKU, and REDD brand names. It is also involved in the meat processing activities. The company was formerly known as PT Estika Tata Tiara and changed its name to PT Estika Tata Tiara Tbk. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Estika Tata Tiara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tiga Tunggal Adimulya.
